__e: We're home free, and you pull this?
It is best that we already have received Jesus so that we are saved and ready.
But how are five, but four and the fifth left him there.
And miss Saved By The Bell?
“By grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: Not of works, lest any man should boast” (Ephesians 2:8-9).
We are children of God for we know we have been saved by His grace only.
“For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: Not of works [either physical or mental], lest any man should boast” (Ephesians 2:8-9).
But because of me... through my mediation with my master... the lord of flies... you, all of you... unworthy though you may be... will be safe from the Red Death.
WE ARE NOT ALL SAVED IN THE SAME WAY
They killed him because they were afraid of him, but he saved us from sickness.
